name: saru
text: I think the idea is that his veganism is just part of his repression. He knows something's wrong, but he doesn't know what, so he'll just try to suppress everything until he doesn't feel so ashamed anymore.

name: dissembly
text:
I think the veganism is just that he enjoys having something to hit other people over the head with.

Morally speaking.

name: dovey
text: It's quite obvious that Onstad just copy-pasted the artwork out of that strip, but somehow that just makes it all the better for me. Dunno why.

name: william
text: Alt TexT: That's a will-readin' tie

name: ojnabieoot
text: The interesting thing is that somewhere on Ray's blog he mentioned that Pat doesn't wear ties because it's a "symbol of oppression."  It was either an obnoxious phase of his, or his greed trumps a silly little thing that he came up with to make himself feel superior to others.

name: sargasm
text: Pat is still cut, but it is still mega-nasty dog shit

text: It probably says a lot about me that I read "cut" to mean something other than "muscular" at first.

name: alphagator
text: I was kind of feeling the same way about Lyle because I'm an alcoholic. Maybe we could have a socially acceptable, employed alcoholic to represent us?

name: professoryes
text: Though, to be fair, Lyle's alcoholism is a bit different than the usual come-home-from-work-and-drink-until-out-cold fare.

name: epicurus
text: Actually it's exactly the same except you have to remove the "come-home-from-work-and-" part.

name: spinynorman
text:
Well, Onstad's really into cooking and various kinds of Chefery, and if Gordon Ramsay and Tony Bourdain are anything to judge by then a lot of culinary folks don't approve of morality entering their kitchen and handicapping what they eat, nor can they understand why anyone else would allow it.

This is just a guess, though. But as I believe he's spoken admiringly of Ramsay then it may be somewhat true.

name: tfaironpirate
text:
Yeah, seriously, what's this crap about well represented Vegan character, how about a little better Gay representation. Oh wait... Simon... and well, Arthur I guess. No not really Arthur.


Man, now I realize that everyone's going to think I'm gay.

name: cailetshadow
text:
Pat is a dick first and foremost, not a vegan. His veganism is just another way to prove himself superior, just as many people use politics, gender, or religion to make themselves feel superior.
Gays could probably ask for better "representation" than Pat, too.

name: deusoma
text: How about Chucklebot?

name: dovey
text: Nah, his chuckles are a little too harsh.

name: mugi
text: He's working the rough chuckles.

name: heyman
text: A comment left by heyman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by zojjoperskof, Contrasoma, woodenteeth)

name: steerpike66
text: It's not the fact that Pet is a vegan, any more than it's normal for gays to be assholes. pat is an asshole; he can convert veganism, homosexuality, liberalism, political awareness, anything into fuel for his asshole motor.

name: minarch
text: "Asshole motor" is exactly the kind of phrase that I don't need popping into my head.

name: presterjohn
text: Thinking your diet makes you a persecuted minority is what gives you a bad name, dude.

name: semiquaver
text:
Wait. You think the fact that he's an angry homosexual who happens to be a vegan reflects horribly on veganism?

Uh, I don't care how you slice it, that is major mean towards us gay types. No offense, but I'd be a tad more offended if a gay dude turned out to be a rude vegan.

"That common perception gives us a bad name." Thanks, we don't like being associated with you bloodless politically-correct persons either. Given that Onstad's wife is practically vegetarian, though, I somehow don't think it's you guys he could be discriminating against.

name: dovey
text:
MAYBE HE'S NOT DISCRIMINATING AGAINST ANYONE

MAYBE THIS IS JUST A CHARACTER IN A COMIC STRIP WHO HAPPENS TO BE A HOMOSEXUAL, A VEGAN, AND A DICK, AND NONE OF THESE TRAITS ARE A COMMENT ON THE OTHERS.

name: semiquaver
text: I was responding to an offensive post, *not* the comic itself.  I didn't ACTUALLY say that Onstad was discriminating against anyone, I just pointed out to the OP that he was being a massive flaming pile of dog's.  Read more carefully :)

name: zem
text: "a massive flaming pile of dog's"?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the word penis was silent.

name: zem
text: that doesn't help me assemble a meaningful sentence!

name: semiquaver
text: you are correct sir.

name: fosters
text:
YES AND AS A GLASSES WEARER I DEMAND BETTER REPRESENTATION

Get over it; Pat's defining characteristic is being a dick, not that he's vegan or gay or a mammal. The former doesn't say anything about the latters.

name: dovey
text: Oh shit dude, in my Internet indignance I trampled all over your post and I did it in all-caps. Please accept my apologies and chubbies.
